nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in mixed layer eddy test case. Typical value is 60.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the domain for the mixed layer eddy test case.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_mixed_layer_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the mixed layer for the mixed layer eddy test case.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_base_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature at the base of the mixed layer.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_temperature_stratification_mixed_layer
nml_option.description: Vertical temperature gradient in the mixed layer.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_temperature_stratification_interior
nml_option.description: Vertical temperature gradient in the interior.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_temperature_horizontal_gradient
nml_option.description: Horizontal temperature gradient in the mixed layer.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_temperature_perturbation_magnitude
nml_option.description: Magnitude of random perturbation in temperature.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_two_fronts
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if the initial fields has two fronts.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_restoring_width
nml_option.description: E-folding width of the restoring region at meridional boundaries, only used for single front.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddy_restoring_tau
nml_option.description: Time scale for restoring at meridional boundaries, only used for single front.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.
